aboutUniversity.title: About the University
aboutUniversity.goal: Our goal is quality education for your successful career
aboutUniversity.description: At MUIT, we train highly skilled specialists in demand in Kyrgyzstan and abroad. Start building your professional future with us. For over 25 years, MUIT has been teaching relevant and in-demand professions. Here, you’ll gain knowledge that can help grow your business or land a job in a major company.

enrollment.title: Enrollment
enrollment.description: Fill out the form to enroll in our university.
enrollment.successMessage: Your application has been successfully submitted!
enrollment.formError: Please fill out all fields correctly.

education-form.title: Full-time
education-form.text: You will attend lectures and seminars during the day 5-6 times a week, take tests and exams. The academic year begins on September 1 and is divided into 2 semesters.
education-form.secondText: In the correspondence course, you study most of the program on your own. Twice a year you come to the University for practice and the closing examination session.

License.content: The International University of Innovative Technologies has a state license and accreditation, which is why we allocate state-funded places each year in several faculties for the most talented students.

HistoryPage.content: The International University of Innovative Technologies (IUIT), established in 2006 as the Academy of Innovative Technologies, hereinafter referred to as IUIT or the University, is an institution that implements higher professional education programs. Address: 720048, Kyrgyz Republic, Bishkek, Ankara Street, 1/17. Certificate of state registration/re-registration of a legal entity: № 55786-3301-U-e; OKPO code 24275760; GPY № 0025883. Tax identification number: 00308200610153. Date of registration/re-registration with the Ministry of Justice of the Kyrgyz Republic: 02.05.2017. The University operates under the Law of the Kyrgyz Republic 'On Education', the Civil Code of the Kyrgyz Republic, the Law of the Kyrgyz Republic 'On Licensing', the Charter of IUIT, and other regulatory acts. In accordance with the Resolution of the Government of the Kyrgyz Republic 'On Establishing a Two-Level Structure of Higher Professional Education in the Kyrgyz Republic' dated August 23, 2011, No. 496, and the order of the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic dated April 16, 2012, No. 244/1, starting from 2012, the University adopted a two-level higher education structure.
HistoryPage.location: Address: 720048, Kyrgyz Republic, Bishkek, Ankara Street, 1/17. Certificate Number: № 55786-3301-U-e; OKPO code: 24275760. Registration with the Ministry of Justice of the Kyrgyz Republic: 02.05.2017.
HistoryPage.content2: The university carries out its educational activities and prepares specialists under higher professional education programs for bachelor's, master's, and doctoral studies based on the licenses of the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic: No. LD150000763 dated 07.08.2015 (bachelor's, specialty), LD150001054 No. 1-18-1 dated 04.12.2015, No. LD 160000749 No. 1-19 dated 01.11.2016 (master's), LE150000095 dated 13.11.2014, LE150001566 dated 07.08.2015, LF150000373 dated 23.09.2015 (short-term professional development and further education courses)
HistoryPage.title: The university has planned income and expenditure budgets that are adjusted annually. Currently, the IUIT faculty consists of 120 members.
HistoryPage.location2: Address: 720048, Kyrgyz Republic, Bishkek, Ankarа Street, 1/17 Phone: +996 (312) 590-599
HistoryPage.profile7: financeMgmt, financeCredit, accountingAudit, automation1c, businessAnalysis, taxation, economicSecurity, bankingTech

infoSection.title: Information for Applicants
infoSection.text1: At MUIT, you can apply for budget-funded spots or contract-based education.
infoSection.text2: MUIT offers discounts and benefits for tuition fees for disabled individuals, orphans, and those under guardianship.
infoSection.text3: Admission and enrollment based on current year results are conducted online.
infoSection.text4: The registration and competitive selection process for 2022 is exclusively online on designated portals.

importantLinks.programList: List of specialties for 2024-2025 academic year.

foreignStudentsSection.title: For International Students
foreignStudentsSection.text: Admission for international students is based on the regulations approved by the government of Kyrgyzstan.

entranceExams.title: Entrance Exams for International Students
entranceExams.item1: All applicants must take an exam in Russian.
entranceExams.item2: Some fields require an additional test in math or physics.
entranceExams.item3: Applicants must achieve a minimum score for admission.
entranceExams.item4: Further details are available on the MUIT website and edugate.edu.gov.kg.

vision.title: VISION AND MISSION
vision.text: IITU is an open-type higher education institution capable of perceiving, accumulating, creating, and disseminating new knowledge and innovative business proposals, providing scientific and educational services using modern technologies, training competitive specialists who meet the requirements and expectations of consumers, society, and the state, demonstrating a commitment to integration into the global educational community and implementing a policy of sustainable innovative development in practice.
vision.text3: Training competitive specialists who meet the requirements and expectations of stakeholders, possess innovative technologies, and are capable of effectively solving engineering and socio-economic problems of modern society.
vision.description: Modernization of the educational and training complex through the enhancement of the scientific potential of the teaching staff, the introduction of information technologies for learning, and educational programs across a wide range of fields and specialties, meeting the requirements of innovative economic development, modern needs of individuals, society, and the state, through integration into the international scientific and educational space.
vision.heading: Tasks of IITU
vision.primary: Maintain close cooperation with employers regarding the modernization of curricula, ensuring internship placements, improving the quality of specialist training, evaluating learning outcomes, and facilitating graduate employment.
vision.primary2: Develop and implement innovative educational programs and forms of training that are relevant to the labor market, aimed at replenishing the country's production sector with in-demand specialists.
vision.primary3: Enhance and deepen scientific activities to develop applied and fundamental research, expand master's programs and postgraduate studies as the foundation for creating an innovative research and educational complex.
vision.primary4: Improve the material and technical base of educational and scientific activities, as well as the material infrastructure supporting the social life of students, faculty, and staff.
vision.primary5: Explore ways to increase the university's income through educational and innovative activities, including targeted training of specialists, providing consulting and engineering services, technology transfer, and distance learning.
vision.primary6: Continue to develop and strengthen long-term relationships between MUIIT and its strategic partners within the country and the international academic, scientific, and business communities in educational and scientific-technical activities.
vision.primary7: Create an environment that ensures a high level of information culture within the university community and beyond, establishing a foundation for the information-technology support of educational-scientific and administrative-management activities.
vision.primary8: Create a foundation for transitioning to a trilingual (Kyrgyz, Russian, and English) education system, expanding students' opportunities to learn foreign languages, both European and Asian, at a level that meets modern standards.
vision.primary9: Improve the system for enhancing the qualifications of faculty members through master's and postgraduate programs, as well as establish a 'Young Teacher's School.'

windowPage.digitalTransformationConcept: In order to implement the Digital Transformation Concept 'Digital Kyrgyzstan 2019-2023' and ensure high-quality, timely provision of services, the following services have been automated at the MUIT:
windowPage.readyCertificates: Ready certificates can be obtained at the 'Single Window' office (Academic Department, Room 346). You must have an ID document with you.

applicantsPage.admissionInfo: At IUIT, you can apply for state-funded places (if your ORT score is over 200 or you have a gold certificate), as well as for paid contract-based education.
applicantsPage.paymentBenefits: Payment benefits are provided to persons with disabilities of group I and II, orphans, and children under guardianship. The amount and period of the benefits are determined by the IUIT commission.
applicantsPage.electronicRegistration: Electronic registration is carried out exclusively in a remote format on the portals.
documentsList: Scan copy of the education document
Electronic version of the 3x4 cm photo
Scan copies of documents granting benefits
Scan copy of the ORT certificate (for citizens of the Kyrgyz Republic)
applicantsPage.additionalNotes:
• Medical certificate form No. 086-U is not required.
• IUIT does not have dormitories.
• The full list of specialties is available in the IUIT brochure.

introCard.title: Institutes
introCard.description: With IUIT University, you receive quality education and professions in demand in the modern world.

collegesPage.after9Or11: After the 9th or 11th grade, students can enter colleges to receive vocational education. Colleges offer both practical and theoretical knowledge that helps prepare specialists in various fields. It's a great choice for those who want to start a career or continue their education at a university.

comtehnoCard.title: Bishkek College of Computer Systems and Technologies
comtehnoCard.description: The college offers programs in programming, management, design, and other in-demand professions.
comtehnoCard.moreInfo: More details on the website: https://comtehno.kg/

itecCard.title: College of Innovative Technologies and Economics
itecCard.description: This college trains students for professions in economics, design, IT, and management.
itecCard.moreInfo: More details on the website: https://itec.kg/

collegesPage.careerOpportunities: These colleges offer great opportunities to start a career in in-demand fields such as IT, management, economics, and design. You can develop your skills and get a profession that will be in demand in the job market.
